title: npm error while truffle installation
body:
I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue
I am trying to run the command npm install -g truffle and it has been giving a lot of errors. I am working behind a proxy net yet I made sure that I set the npm proxy right. The installation takes about 5-10 mins and ends with the error message. Kindly help me solve this. 

## Steps to Reproduce

 npm install -g truffle

## Actual Results

PS C:\Users\Z003TCDN.AD001> npm install -g truffle
npm ERR! exited with error code: 128

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     C:\Users\Z003TCDN.AD001\AppData\Roaming\npm-cache\_logs\2017-06-20T12_08_49_358Z-debug.log

## Environment

*Operating System: Windows 7 Enterprise 
*Truffle version: Not installed
*Ethereum client: Geth v1.6.5-stable
*node version: v8.1.2
*npm version: 5.0.3

FYI this is the log file that was generated:
